name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Dwayne E. HAWK, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Dwayne E. HAWK, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 14th day of March, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, BUT LIMITED to the following issue:
Whether the trial court’s refusal to permit the testimony of the forensic scientist regarding the results of the rape kit test so prejudiced Petitioner as to merit a new trial.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Phyllis A. Jin, Uniontown, for Petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
690 A.2d 231
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Dwayne E. HAWK, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 14, 1997.
Phyllis A. Jin, Uniontown, for Petitioner.
